thread.title: BRIEF-Cowen Says Peter Cohen Has Chosen Not To Stand For Re-Election To Its Board

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Cowen Says Peter Cohen Has Chosen Not To Stand For Re-Election To Its Board
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Cowen Inc:
* COWEN ANNOUNCES THAT PETER A. COHEN HAS CHOSEN NOT TO STAND FOR RE-ELECTION TO COWEN’S BOARD OF DIRECTORS
* COWEN INC - JEROME S. MARKOWITZ, COWEN’S LEAD INDEPENDENT DIRECTOR, TO BECOME CHAIRMAN Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
